get.summary: Gets all transactions for the logged-in consumer

parameters.name: x-noba-timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds, use: new Date().getTime().toString()

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: Consumer ID whose transactions is needed

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: pageOffset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip, offset 0 means first page results, 1 means second page etc.

parameters.name: pageLimit
parameters.description: number of items per page

parameters.name: creditCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular credit currency

parameters.name: debitCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular debit currency

parameters.name: transactionStatus
parameters.description: filter for a particular transaction status

get.summary: Downloads all the transactions of a particular consumer

parameters.name: x-noba-timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds, use: new Date().getTime().toString()

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: Consumer ID whose transactions is needed

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: pageOffset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip, offset 0 means first page results, 1 means second page etc.

parameters.name: pageLimit
parameters.description: number of items per page

parameters.name: creditCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular credit currency

parameters.name: debitCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular debit currency

parameters.name: transactionStatus
parameters.description: filter for a particular transaction status

parameters.name: reportFormat
parameters.description: Format in which you want the transactions report. Current 'CSV' is supported.

200.description: A CSV or PDF file containing details of all the transactions made by the consumer

parameters.name: x-noba-timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds, use: new Date().getTime().toString()

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: Consumer ID whose transactions is needed

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Format: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2010-04-27

parameters.name: pageOffset
parameters.description: number of pages to skip, offset 0 means first page results, 1 means second page etc.

parameters.name: pageLimit
parameters.description: number of items per page

parameters.name: creditCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular credit currency

parameters.name: debitCurrency
parameters.description: filter for a particular debit currency

parameters.name: transactionStatus
parameters.description: filter for a particular transaction status

parameters.name: x-noba-timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds, use: new Date().getTime().toString()

bankRate.description: The exchange rate set by the bank, calculated as numerator/denominator

nobaRate.description: The exchange rate set by Noba, calculated as numerator/denominator. If not set, will default to bankRate.

expirationTimestamp.description: The timestamp at which this exchange rate expires. If not set, will default to 24 hours from now.

userID.description: userId of user who owns the refresh token

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to get new acess token

emailOrPhone.description: Email or phone value to identify the user

identityType.description: Identity type of the user logging in

otp.description: One-time password sent to email or phone

includeRefreshToken.description: include refresh token to get new token on expiry of current access token

emailOrPhone.description: Email or phone value to identify the user

identityType.description: Identity type of the user logging in

autoCreate.description: Whether or not to auto-create an account if not present

fiatAmount.description: Fiat amount in currency represented by 'fiatCurrency' property

fiatCurrency.description: Fiat currency used to purchase crypto

cryptoQuantityExpected.description: Amount of crypto initially expected (see 'cryptoAmountSettled' for final confirmed amount)

cryptoAmountSettled.description: Amount of crypto purchased and settled on the blockchain

processingFee.description: Payment processing fee for the transaction

networkFee.description: Network / gas fee required to settle the transaction on chain

nobaFee.description: Noba service fee for the transaction

conversionRate.description: Conversion rate used between the 'fiatCurrency' and 'cryptocurrency'

totalFee.description: Total additional fee paid by the consumer for the transacion

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in format YYYY-MM-DD

id.description: Unique ID for this identity verification request

url.description: URL for identity verification document capture redirect

expiration.description: Expiration time of the url (in ms since the epoch)
